import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_9qd1taj", "template_su0puwl", form.current, "3gNpWLcL-g32TfqK0" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); setShowModal(true); // Show the modal upon successful submission }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); }; return (
{/* Modal */} {showModal && (

Thank you for your submission!

We will get back to you shortly.

)}
); }; export default Contact;
